board

Class ShoveTraceAlgo

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.ShoveTraceAlgo

  • public class ShoveTraceAlgo
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains internal auxiliary functions of class RoutingBoard for shoving traces
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double check(RoutingBoard p_board, LineSegment p_line_segment, boolean p_shove_to_the_left, int p_layer, int[] p_net_no_arr, int p_trace_half_width, int p_cl_type, int p_max_recursion_depth, int p_max_via_recursion_depth)
      Checks if a shove with the input parameters is possible without clearance violations The result is the maximum lenght of a trace from the start of the line segment to the end of the line segment, for wich the algoritm succeedes.
      boolean check(TileShape p_trace_shape, CalcFromSide p_from_side, Direction p_dir, int p_layer, int[] p_net_no_arr, int p_cl_type, int p_max_recursion_depth, int p_max_via_recursion_depth, int p_max_spring_over_recursion_depth, TimeLimit p_time_limit)
      Checks if a shove with the input parameters is possible without clearance violations p_dir is used internally to prevent the check from bouncing back.
      boolean insert(TileShape p_trace_shape, CalcFromSide p_from_side, int p_layer, int[] p_net_no_arr, int p_cl_type, java.util.Collection<Item> p_ignore_items, int p_max_recursion_depth, int p_max_via_recursion_depth, int p_max_spring_over_recursion_depth)
      Puts in a trace segment with the input parameters and shoves obstacles out of the way.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        public boolean check(TileShape p_trace_shape,
                     CalcFromSide p_from_side,
                     Direction p_dir,
                     int p_layer,
                     int[] p_net_no_arr,
                     int p_cl_type,
                     int p_max_recursion_depth,
                     int p_max_via_recursion_depth,
                     int p_max_spring_over_recursion_depth,
                     TimeLimit p_time_limit)
        Checks if a shove with the input parameters is possible without clearance violations p_dir is used internally to prevent the check from bouncing back. Returns false, if the shove failed.
        Parameters:
        p_trace_shape - a TileShape object.
        p_from_side - a CalcFromSide object.
        p_dir - a Direction object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_cl_type - a int.
        p_max_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_max_via_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_max_spring_over_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_time_limit - a TimeLimit object.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • check

        public static double check(RoutingBoard p_board,
                           LineSegment p_line_segment,
                           boolean p_shove_to_the_left,
                           int p_layer,
                           int[] p_net_no_arr,
                           int p_trace_half_width,
                           int p_cl_type,
                           int p_max_recursion_depth,
                           int p_max_via_recursion_depth)
        Checks if a shove with the input parameters is possible without clearance violations The result is the maximum lenght of a trace from the start of the line segment to the end of the line segment, for wich the algoritm succeedes. If the algorithm succeedes completely, the result will be equal to Integer.MAX_VALUE.
        Parameters:
        p_board - a RoutingBoard object.
        p_line_segment - a LineSegment object.
        p_shove_to_the_left - a boolean.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_trace_half_width - a int.
        p_cl_type - a int.
        p_max_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_max_via_recursion_depth - a int.
        Returns:
        a double.

      • insert

        public boolean insert(TileShape p_trace_shape,
                      CalcFromSide p_from_side,
                      int p_layer,
                      int[] p_net_no_arr,
                      int p_cl_type,
                      java.util.Collection<Item> p_ignore_items,
                      int p_max_recursion_depth,
                      int p_max_via_recursion_depth,
                      int p_max_spring_over_recursion_depth)
        Puts in a trace segment with the input parameters and shoves obstacles out of the way. If the shove does not work, the database may be damaged. To prevent this, call check first.
        Parameters:
        p_trace_shape - a TileShape object.
        p_from_side - a CalcFromSide object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_cl_type - a int.
        p_ignore_items - a Collection object.
        p_max_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_max_via_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_max_spring_over_recursion_depth - a int.
        Returns:
        a boolean.
